tweet: Just arrived in Antigua and Barbuda to write my next book.
Came back from the farmers market in downtown St. John's. Glad to have internet now but still catching up on posts, email, and other stuff.
The internet in Antigua is slower than I've been used to. Going to have to work differently to compensate.
Just came back from enjoying the sunset on Jabberwock beach in Antigua. Antigua is nice.
Disembarked in Antigua from a cruise through the eastrn Caribbean on the Carnival Victory ... now to write my new books http://bit.ly/6wH0k1
